mapper.insert:
SELECT nvl(MAX(to_number(rev_num)), 0) + 1 AS "revNum" FROM review
insert into review values(#{revNum}, #{ctgr}, #{ctgrNum}, #{id}, #{star}, #{cntn}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select round(avg(star), 1) as "star" from review GROUP by ctgr, ctgr_num HAVING ctgr = #{ctgr} and ctgr_num= #{ctgrNum}
